languages.text: {n}Приближаясь к поврежденному алтарю, вы ощущаете неприятную слабость. В ушах звучит едва различимый звон, будто гладкая поверхность камня стонет от нанесенных ран.{/n}
{n}As you approach the damaged altar, you feel an unpleasant weakness. You hear a faint ringing in your ears, as if the smooth surface of the stone is groaning from the wounds it has suffered.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Приближаясь к поврежденному алтарю, вы ощущаете неприятную слабость. В ушах звучит едва различимый звон, будто гладкая поверхность камня стонет от нанесенных ран.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As you approach the damaged altar, you feel an unpleasant weakness. You hear a faint ringing in your ears, as if the smooth surface of the stone is groaning from the wounds it has suffered.{/n}
{n}As you approach the damaged altar, you feel an unpleasant weakness. You hear a faint ringing in your ears, as if the smooth surface of the stone is groaning from the wounds it has suffered.{/n}

{n}As you approach the damaged altar, you feel an unpleasant weakness. You hear a faint ringing in your ears, as if the smooth surface of the stone is groaning from the wounds it has suffered.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Als du dich dem beschädigten Altar näherst, spürst du eine unangenehme Schwäche. Du hörst ein entferntes Läuten, wie ein Stöhnen der glatten Steinoberfläche wegen der erlittenen Wunden.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach the damaged altar, you feel an unpleasant weakness. You hear a faint ringing in your ears, as if the smooth surface of the stone is groaning from the wounds it has suffered.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Als du dich dem beschädigten Altar näherst, spürst du eine unangenehme Schwäche. Du hörst ein entferntes Läuten, wie ein Stöhnen der glatten Steinoberfläche wegen der erlittenen Wunden.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous sentez une faiblesse déplaisante à mesure que vous approchez de l'autel endommagé. Vous entendez un léger sifflement dans vos oreilles, comme si la surface lisse de la pierre gémissait sous la douleur des blessures qui lui ont été infligées.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach the damaged altar, you feel an unpleasant weakness. You hear a faint ringing in your ears, as if the smooth surface of the stone is groaning from the wounds it has suffered.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous sentez une faiblesse déplaisante à mesure que vous approchez de l'autel endommagé. Vous entendez un léger sifflement dans vos oreilles, comme si la surface lisse de la pierre gémissait sous la douleur des blessures qui lui ont été infligées.{/n}

languages.text: {n}当你靠近损害的祭坛时，你感觉到了某种令人不快的虚弱感。你听到耳中传来了微弱的嗡嗡声，仿佛光滑的石头表面由于受到破坏，此刻正在不断呻吟。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach the damaged altar, you feel an unpleasant weakness. You hear a faint ringing in your ears, as if the smooth surface of the stone is groaning from the wounds it has suffered.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}当你靠近损害的祭坛时，你感觉到了某种令人不快的虚弱感。你听到耳中传来了微弱的嗡嗡声，仿佛光滑的石头表面由于受到破坏，此刻正在不断呻吟。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cuando te acercas al altar dañado, sientes una debilidad desagradable. Oyes un pitido débil en los oídos, como si la suave superficie de la piedra se quejara por las heridas que ha sufrido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach the damaged altar, you feel an unpleasant weakness. You hear a faint ringing in your ears, as if the smooth surface of the stone is groaning from the wounds it has suffered.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cuando te acercas al altar dañado, sientes una debilidad desagradable. Oyes un pitido débil en los oídos, como si la suave superficie de la piedra se quejara por las heridas que ha sufrido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}壊れた祭壇に近づくと、不快な虚弱感を覚えた。石の滑らかな表面が受けた傷から呻くかのように、かすかに耳鳴りがした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach the damaged altar, you feel an unpleasant weakness. You hear a faint ringing in your ears, as if the smooth surface of the stone is groaning from the wounds it has suffered.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}壊れた祭壇に近づくと、不快な虚弱感を覚えた。石の滑らかな表面が受けた傷から呻くかのように、かすかに耳鳴りがした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hasarlı sunağa yaklaştığın sırada nahoş bir hâlsizlik hissediyorsun. Kulaklarındaysa sanki bir taşın pürüzsüz yüzeyi, aldığı yaralardan dolayı inlermişçesine bir çınlama duyuyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you approach the damaged altar, you feel an unpleasant weakness. You hear a faint ringing in your ears, as if the smooth surface of the stone is groaning from the wounds it has suffered.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hasarlı sunağa yaklaştığın sırada nahoş bir hâlsizlik hissediyorsun. Kulaklarındaysa sanki bir taşın pürüzsüz yüzeyi, aldığı yaralardan dolayı inlermişçesine bir çınlama duyuyorsun."{/n}
